title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
synopsis: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to reclaim their old glory.
cast: Liam Neeson, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman

title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
synopsis: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padm√© Amidala while Obi-Wan Kenobi investigates an assassination attempt on the senator and discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.
cast: Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman, Ewan McGregor

title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
synopsis: As the Clone Wars rage, the rift between Chancellor Palpatine and the Jedi Council widens. Anakin Skywalker becomes closer to Palpatine and is lured into the dark side of the Force, becoming Darth Vader.
cast: Hayden Christensen, Natalie Portman, Ewan McGregor

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
synopsis: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.
cast: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
synopsis: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Master Yoda.
cast: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
synopsis: Luke Skywalker battles Jabba the Hutt and Darth Vader to save his comrades in the Rebel Alliance and triumph over the Galactic Empire.
cast: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
synopsis: Three decades after the Empire's defeat, a new threat arises in the form of the First Order. Rey, a scavenger, and Finn, a defecting stormtrooper, join Han Solo and Chewbacca in a quest to help the Resistance.
cast: Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Oscar Isaac

title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
synopsis: Rey seeks guidance from Luke Skywalker as the Resistance battles the First Order. Meanwhile, Leia leads a struggle to survive and Poe Dameron clashes with Vice Admiral Holdo.
cast: Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Oscar Isaac

title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
synopsis: The surviving members of the Resistance face the First Order once again, while Rey seeks her identity and confronts the revived Emperor Palpatine.
cast: Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Oscar Isaac

title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
synopsis: In a time of conflict, a group of unlikely heroes band together on a mission to steal the plans to the Death Star, the Empire's ultimate weapon of destruction.
cast: Felicity Jones, Diego Luna, Alan Tudyk
